messages.title: Working for local people
messages.content: Every job created helps build a better future for all of us. We must invest in green jobs, a better public transport system, the regeneration of our town centres and opportunities for our young people. We need to protect the minimum wage, improved rights at work, working families pension credits, the winter fuel allowance and free bus passes for pensioners.

messages.title: Standing up for Pensioners
messages.content: Katy has campaigned against attacks on public sector pensions schemes and for better pension provision in the private sector.

messages.title: My priorities
messages.content: Employment, Families, Protecting public services, Communities, Transport

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will fight for real jobs and investment
I will work towards more opportunities for young people
I will fight to retain public services against privatisation
I will stand up for local communities and work for better council houses
I will fight for better transport links

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race-a Labour Government or a Tory Government. Make sure that you use your vote.

housing.content: More funding to build desperately needed council houses.

leaflet.personalStatement: I put the interests of North Ayrshire and Arran first.

socialMedia.facebook: facebook.com/Katy Clark for North Ayrshire and Arran

images.caption: Katy has campaigned against attacks on public sector pensions and for better pension provision in the private sector.
Katy has campaigned for working families, with tax credits, record rises in child benefits, free child tax fund, the child care and improved maternity and paternity rights.
Katy has campaigned for better rights at work, including new rights for agency workers and better rights for young people.
